title: ∙ Pope Francis kisses David Rockefeller's hand?
subtitle: A picture of Pope Francis salutes Holocaust survivors is part of a mimick containing an unfounded claim that the spiritual leader accepts an alleged architectural hand for a new world order.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The picture shows Pope Francis accepting David Rockefeller's hand, Henry Kissinger, or one of many other people targeted by conspiracy theories as part of a widespread global conspiracy.
